title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20"! This lightweight hardside suitcase is the perfect companion for your travels. With its silent spinner wheels, you'll be gliding effortlessly through airports and train stations. 

Available in a range of vibrant colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, this luggage is a stylish choice for any traveler. The ABS hard shell and steel rod construction ensure durability and protection for your belongings. 

With a generous capacity of 33L and dimensions of 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76", there's plenty of space to pack everything you need for a 1-3 day trip. Despite its spacious interior, this suitcase weighs only 5.62lb, making it incredibly lightweight and easy to carry. 

The 360 degree silent double spinner wheels provide smooth and effortless maneuverability, while the TSA lock ensures the security of your belongings. Inside, you'll find a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps to keep your items organized and secure. The full capacity design maximizes storage space, allowing you to pack efficiently and effectively. 

Travel in style and convenience with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20". Get yours today and experience the ultimate travel companion!

Introducing the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" - the perfect travel companion for your next adventure! This lightweight hardside suitcase is designed to make your travel experience seamless and hassle-free. 

With its ABS hard shell construction and steel rod frame, this luggage offers exceptional durability and protection for your belongings. Available in a range of stylish colors including Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple, you can choose the one that suits your personal style. 

The spacious 33L capacity provides ample space for your essentials, while the compact size of 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H) allows it to fit perfectly under most airplane seats, making it ideal for short trips of 1-3 days. 

One of the standout features of this luggage is its 360-degree silent double spinner wheels. These wheels ensure smooth and effortless maneuverability, allowing you to glide through crowded airports and busy streets with ease. Say goodbye to noisy and clunky wheels!

Your security is our top priority, which is why this luggage is equipped with a TSA lock, providing peace of mind during your travels. 

But that's not all - this Travelhouse Underseat Luggage also offers a range of convenient features. The interior includes a mesh zip pocket and elasticated straps, keeping your belongings organized and secure. The full capacity design maximizes storage space, allowing you to pack efficiently for your trip. 

Not only is this luggage practical, but it is also designed with your comfort in mind. The TPR soft handle with a straight handle design ensures a comfortable grip, while the adjustable heights provide flexibility for users of different heights. 

In addition, this suitcase is lightweight, weighing only 5.62lb, which means you can pack more without worrying about exceeding weight limits. The scratch-resistant and impact-resistant features further enhance the durability of this luggage, ensuring it withstands the rigors of travel. 

Upgrade your travel experience with the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20". With its striking design, exceptional durability, and convenient features, this suitcase is the perfect companion for your next adventure. Choose your favorite color and start traveling in style today!
